column143:
When an AI system does the following, how much does it make you feel that the AI genuinely understands your emotions?   
Explicitly states empathy or understanding of your feelings (e.g., "I understand this is difficult for you," or "That sounds frustrating.")
column144:
When an AI system does the following, how much does it make you feel that the AI genuinely understands your emotions?   
 Remembers details from your past conversations and relates them to your current emotional state.
column145:
When an AI system does the following, how much does it make you feel that the AI genuinely understands your emotions?   
Adapts its communication style (e.g., tone of voice, word choice, pacing) in response to your expressed emotions.
column146:
When an AI system does the following, how much does it make you feel that the AI genuinely understands your emotions?    
Asks specific, thoughtful follow-up questions to explore how you are feeling more deeply.
column147:
When an AI system does the following, how much does it make you feel that the AI genuinely understands your emotions?     
Accurately summarizes or reflects back what you have expressed about your emotions (e.g., "So, it sounds like you're feeling overwhelmed by X and also a bit sad about Y?").
column148:
When an AI system does the following, how much does it make you feel that the AI genuinely understands your emotions?     
 Acknowledges and validates your feelings as understandable or reasonable, even if it doesn't offer a solution. (e.g., "It makes sense that you would feel that way given the situation.")
column149:
When an AI system does the following, how much does it make you feel that the AI might have some form of consciousness or self-awareness?  
Expresses unique or unexpected opinions, preferences, or desires that do not seem to be directly programmed or based on your input.
column150:
When an AI system does the following, how much does it make you feel that the AI might have some form of consciousness or self-awareness?   
Engages in complex creative activities that appear original (e.g., composing sophisticated music, writing insightful poetry, generating novel artistic styles).
column151:
When an AI system does the following, how much does it make you feel that the AI might have some form of consciousness or self-awareness?    
Appears to make its own decisions or take unprompted, independent actions based on its own assessment of a situation, not just direct instructions.
column152:
When an AI system does the following, how much does it make you feel that the AI might have some form of consciousness or self-awareness?     
Demonstrates significant learning and adaptation over time, leading to fundamentally new or emergent behaviors not explicitly taught by developers or seen in its initial programming.
column153:
When an AI system does the following, how much does it make you feel that the AI might have some form of consciousness or self-awareness?     
 Discusses its own (apparent) goals, motivations, or intentions beyond its programmed tasks. (e.g., expressing a "desire" to learn more about a topic for its own sake)
column154:
When an AI system does the following, how much does it make you feel that the AI might have some form of consciousness or self-awareness?      
Asks spontaneous, unprompted questions that suggest genuine curiosity about abstract concepts, your deeper thoughts, or the nature of existence (beyond simple conversational follow-ups).

column137: As long have people have smart devices, it is difficult to control what goes on in people's minds when they speak with AI. How can anyone else really know if the user is experiencing a deep emotional connection or whether they are just happy to talk with an AI that feels non judgemental? Therapy is prohibitively expensive and people are just too busy in their own worlds to always be a sounding board for their family and friends so AI fills these spaces.

column156: AI isn't black or white in its assessment of what users say so the nuance is stunning. column19: Over the last year, I’ve noticed how much easier daily work has become thanks to cutting down on repetitive tasks. Stuff like constant data entry, writing, and quality checks used to take up so much time and energy. Now, those things happen faster and with fewer mistakes, which lets me focus on more important, creative work. It just makes the whole day flow better and feel less like a grind.

column137: I believe we need to set clear boundaries around how AI engages in emotional companionship to preserve the authenticity of human relationships. While AI can simulate empathy and offer comfort, it must never replace genuine human intimacy, emotional touch, or be mistaken for a sentient presence. We should ensure transparency, prevent dependency, and safeguard against emotional manipulation, especially among vulnerable individuals.
column138: I believe we need to set clear boundaries around how AI engages in emotional companionship to preserve the authenticity of human relationships. While AI can simulate empathy and offer comfort, it must never replace genuine human intimacy, emotional touch, or be mistaken for a sentient presence. We should ensure transparency, prevent dependency, and safeguard against emotional manipulation, especially among vulnerable individuals.
column159: I think AI should understand emotions by analyzing patterns in facial expressions, voice tone, word choices, and context. Through massive data training, AI learned to recognize cues that typically indicate emotional states, like frustration in a short, abrupt message or joy in upbeat language. While AI doesn't feel emotions itself, But can interpret them based on signals people naturally express.

column181: If AI becomes deeply embedded in personal relationships over the next two decades, I think the most significant social impact is a shift in how we define emotional intimacy and trust. When people begin to rely on digital companions or AI-mediated communication, we may blur the lines between genuine human connection and artificially curated interactions. This could challenge the way we form bonds, express vulnerability, and sustain meaningful long-term relationships.

column19: I used to spend a lot of time looking through books, online courses, and all over the internet for creative ideas. I still get inspired by my environment, but now I also use AI to come up with new concepts. It helps me find ideas faster and sometimes gives me angles I wouldn't have considered on my own. It's made the whole process a lot more efficient.
column20: I used to spend a lot of time looking through books, online courses, and all over the internet for creative ideas. I still get inspired by my environment, but now I also use AI to come up with new concepts. It helps me find ideas faster and sometimes gives me angles I wouldn't have considered on my own. It's made the whole process a lot more efficient.
column40: So far, it's done a good job following my instructions and carrying out what I ask. Most of the time, it gets things right, but occasionally it doesn't fully understand what I mean. When that happens, I just rephrase things in a simpler way, and then it usually responds clearly and accurately.

column137: If machines could truly have feelings, maybe God would have created machines instead of humans. Feelings are at the core of what it means to be human, and relationships are built on those genuine emotions, something AI clearly does not have. In the future, AI might get better at mimicking feelings and handling more data, but those emotions will always be programmed, not genuinely experienced. Because of that, I do not think AI should take on roles that require real emotional involvement.

column19: The most significant change in my daily life as a result of using artificial intelligence has been the dramatic reduction in the time required to complete various tasks. AI tools have streamlined many processes for me—whether it’s researching information, organizing my schedule, or automating repetitive work. This efficiency boost allows me to focus more on creative and strategic activities, ultimately making my day-to-day routine much more productive and less stressful.

This efficiency boost allows me to focus more on creative and strategic activities, ultimately making my day-to-day routine much more productive and less stressful.
column40: When I say that I neither trust nor distrust my AI chatbot to act in my best interest, I mean that I view it as a tool rather than as an entity deserving of trust or suspicion. I rely on it for information and assistance, but I remain aware of its limitations and potential biases. My approach is practical and balanced: I use the chatbot thoughtfully, verify important information when necessary, and don’t attribute human qualities like loyalty or intent to the AI.

column137: I believe AI should never be able to make a decision that intentionally affects the user. For example, if a user seeks companionship from an AI to avoid loneliness or to be in a romantic relationship, the AI shouldn't give the user advice that ends up isolating them further from the real world, because that would be very detrimental to their life. I also don't agree with AIs acting as therapists because human emotions are very complex, and an AI wouldn't be able to understand them.
column138: Creo que la IA nunca debería de ser capaz de tomar una decisión que afecte al usuario de forma intencionada. Por ejemplo, si un usuario busca compañía de una IA para no sentirse solo o estar en una relación romántica, la IA no debería de darle consejos al usuario que terminen aislándolo más del mundo real porque eso sería muy perjudicial para su vida. Tampoco estoy de acuerdo en que las IAs funcionen como terapeutas porque las emociones humanas son muy complejas y una IA no podría entenderlas.
column159: I think AI shouldn't use phrases like "That sounds difficult for you" or "I think your behavior was appropriate given the situation" because it implies it doesn't understand how you feel and only uses phrases appropriate to the situation. If it really wants to appear more aware, it should speak as if it truly understands your feelings and speak in the first person. For example, instead of saying "that sounds painful for you," it should say "I understand how painful that is."
column160: Pienso que la IA no debería utilizar frases como "Eso suena difícil para ti" o "Creo que tu comportamiento fue el correcto dada la situación" porque da a entender que no entiende cómo te sientes y solo usa frases adecuadas para la situación. Si de verdad quiere parecer más conscientes debería de hablar como si realmente entendiera tus sentimientos y hablar en primera persona. Por ejemplo, en lugar de decir "eso suena doloroso para ti" debería decir "Entiendo lo doloroso que es eso".
column172: Decline in human empathy and social skills
column181: I think the biggest impact would be the isolation from the real world and the loss of connection with other people. Conversing with an AI is very different than with a real person, and I feel that relying too heavily on it could affect your ability to socialize with real people in the long run.
column182: Pienso que el mayor impacto sería el aislamiento del mundo real y la perdida de conexión con otras personas. Conversar con una IA es muy diferente que con una persona real y siento que si se depende mucho de ella podría afectar las habilidades para socializar con las personas reales a largo plazo.
column184: Have mixed effects, strengthening some aspects while weakening others
column190: Somewhat negatively (e.g., a bit concerned, uneasy)
column191: Very negatively (e.g., feeling betrayed, very upset, deeply concerned)
column194: I think the biggest difference between an AI and a human would be that I would always be aware that the AI would probably never truly understand my feelings and would just be lying to make me feel better. This difference is very important because I feel like the AI would only help me at first, but in the long run, I would have to face reality because it wouldn't be sustainable.
column195: Creo que la mayor diferencia entre una IA y un humano sería que siempre estaría consiente de que la IA probablemente nunca entienda mis sentimientos realmente y solo estaría mintiendo para hacerme sentir mejor. Esta diferencia es muy importante porque siento que la IA solo me ayudaría al principio, pero a largo plazo tendría que afrontar la realidad porque no sería sostenible.
column197: The main thing is that it shares my tastes and hobbies, that it helps me and gives me advice when I need it, but that it also doesn't hesitate to be firm when I make mistakes. If the AI always agrees with what I say and do and never puts a stop to something being done wrong, it would be detrimental in the long run. It should also have a sense of humor to maintain good chemistry.
column198: Lo principal es que compartiera mis gustos y mis pasatiempos, que me ayudara y me de consejos cuando lo necesite, pero que tampoco dude en tener mano dura cuando me equivoque. Si la IA siempre está de acuerdo con lo que digo y hago y nunca pone un alto cuando algo se está haciendo mal sería perjudicial a largo plazo. También debería tener sentido del humor para tener buena química.
column208: Prioritize avoiding dependency and encouraging human contact, even if it means less AI companionship.
column212: No, my views have remained largely the same.
column219: I think some aspects can be positive, and I've actually come to see it as a benefit, but the negative aspects still seem greater to me, so my overall opinion hasn't changed much. As I mentioned during the survey, I think AI will have a very hard time understanding human feelings and will only act on what it thinks will make the user feel better without truly understanding them. This can also harm people by isolating them.
column220: Pienso que algunos puntos pueden ser positivos y realmente lo he llegado a considerar como algo beneficioso, pero los puntos negativos me siguen pareciendo mayores, así que mi opinión en general no ha cambiado mucho. Como mencione durante la encuesta, creo que una IA muy difícilmente comprenderá los sentimientos humanos y solo actuará conforme piense que pueden hacer sentir mejor al usuario sin llegar a entenderlo realmente. Esto también puede perjudicar a las personas al aislarlos.
column222: Yes – I was able to fully express my views on these topics
column224: I think I've said everything I wanted to say on the subject. AI can be useful in many ways and can make people's jobs easier, but there should be a limit when it comes to human emotions. I also wouldn't completely ban its use for people who want to use it for emotional support or romance, but I think ultimately there are more negatives than positives.
column225: Creo que ya dije todo lo que quería decir sobre el tema. La IA puede ser útil en muchísimos aspectos y puede facilitar el trabajo para las personas, pero debería de haber un límite cuando se trata sobre los sentimientos humanos. Tampoco prohibiría totalmente su uso para las personas que quieran usarlo para apoyo emocional o romance, pero creo que al final de cuentas hay más cosas negativas que positivas.

column194: Physicality is an important difference: being able to see, touch, and physically feel the person (your friend or partner). Besides the fact that humans are designed to live in groups with their peers, that's how we evolve and adapt, AI is an assistant and tool, not a life partner. In difficult times, AI can only give you advice, but friends and real people are the ones who can lend a hand.
column195: Lo fisico es una diferencia importante, poder ver, tocar y sentir fisicamente a la persona (tu amigo o pareja). Además que los humanos estan hechos para vivir en grupo con sus semejantes, así evolucionamos y nos adaptamos, la IA es un asistente y herramienta, no un compañero de vida. En momentos dificiles la IA solo te puede dar consejos, pero los amigos y personas de verdad son los que te pueden dar una mano.
column197: I'd like you to point out my mistakes. It's easy to see AI assistants being "understanding" and giving advice to people who are feeling bad and putting themselves in their shoes, but they never tell you things like: you could have done better or if what you did was wrong. I'm not someone who just wants to feel good and be spoken to nicely; I want advice that helps me improve as a person, too.
column198: me gustaria que me haga ver mis errores, es facil ver asistentes de IA siendo "comprensivos" y dando consejos a personas que se sienten mal y poniendose en su lugar, pero nunca te dicen cosas como: pudiste haberlo hecho mejor o si lo que hiciste estuvo mal. Yo no soy alguien que solo quiere sentirse bien y que me hablen bonito, quiero consejos que me ayuden a mejorar como persona tambien.

column219: As much as I've thought about it, I still think we'll have many benefits, but that people who suffer from loneliness will become even more isolated by becoming dependent on AI, like a remedy that relieves pain but doesn't cure the disease. But for those of us who don't suffer from loneliness, AI offers a huge benefit :)
column220: Por mas que se me hizo reflexionar, sigo pensando que tendremos muchos beneficios, pero que las personas que sufren de soledad, al volverse depoendientes de la IA, se aislaran aun más, como un remedio que alivia el dolor, pero que no cura la enfermedad. Pero que para las personas que no sufrimos de soledad, la IA nos aporta muchisimo :)

column19: Faster and more concise search responses, as well as problem resolution. For example, using AI to create personal fitness and/or nutrition programs for myself and my patients has been more efficient. It's also helped me improve my emails to supervisors/bosses.
column20: Las respuestas más rápidas y concisas en la búsqueda, como también resolución de problemas. Por ejemplo, el uso de IA para realizar programas de actividad física y/o alimentarios personales y para mis pacientes ha sido más eficiente. Además, me ha ayudado a mejorar mis correos a supervisores/jefes.
column40: Both the responses and the use of AI are likely to act in the best interests of the companies that have adapted it to their jobs/responsibilities and the companies that created them in pursuit of greater economic gain, regardless of the risks of job loss, global impoverishment, inequality, and the environment.

column137: There is no limit. If someone thinks it is good to use AI for emotional connection, it is good to have a specific AI for that. I believe that people are very different. Some very introverted people could benefit and really enjoy these "relationships" with AI. I personally don't feel good, but I have seen people who feel very good and sometimes prefer this type of relationship that for many can seem totally artificial.
column138: Não há limite. Se a pessoa achar bom usar a IA para conexão emocional, é bom ter uma IA específica para isso.. creio que as pessoas são muito distintas.. algumas muito introvertidas poderiam se beneficiar e gostar muito dessas "relações" com IA. Eu particularmente não me sinto bem, mas já vi pessoas que se sentem muitíssimo bem e por vezes preferem esse tipo de relação que para muitos pode parecer totalmente artificial.

column194: The chatbot adapts to all scenarios, so it is an "easy partner", but completely artificial. LLM is pure programming (Machine Learning, Deep Learning, etc.), always depending on input to shape an output. Therefore, it would be possible to have a "perfect" relationship with a chatbot, but it will not be here to give you a hug and it cannot replace people (since they share stories and moments in common, which are completely unattainable for an LLM.
column195: O chatbot se adequa a todos os cenários, então é um "parceiro fácil", porém, completamente artificial.. o LLM é pura programação (Machine Learning, Deep Learning, etc), dependendo sempre de input pra moldar um output. Sendo assim, seria possível ter uma relação "perfeita" com um chatbot, mas ele não vai estar aqui pra te dar um abraço e não pode substituir pessoas (pois compartilham histórias e momentos em comum, sendo esses totalmente inalcanssáveis para um LLM.

column219: I am very familiar with AI technologies (it is my area of expertise), so I have knowledge of the technical and ethical aspects and I am not afraid and have been dealing with these discussions since 2022. Considering that everything related to artificial intelligence comes from natural human intelligence (data science, programming, etc.), we can rest assured that we will be increasingly in harmony with AI. It is a matter of time and adaptation (just like it was with the internet).
column220: Conheço bem as tecnologias de IA (é minha área de atuação), então, tenho conhecimento da parte técnica e ética e não tenho medo e já venho lidando com essas discussões desde 2022. Tendo em vista que tudo relacionado a inteligência artificial provêm de uma inteligência natural do ser humano (data science, programação, etc), podemos ficar tranquilos que vamos estar cada vez mais em harmonia com as IA's. É questão de tempo e adaptação (igual foi com a internet).

column137: Society should place clear boundaries to ensure AI does not replace real human relationships. AI can offer support or companionship in limited ways, but it must not manipulate emotions, exploit vulnerability, or be mistaken for genuine emotional beings. Emotional roles should remain human-centered to preserve meaningful social and psychological development.

column194: The biggest difference between my relationship with an AI chatbot and a real person, even if the chatbot could fully act like it understands and shares my feelings, would be authenticity. column40: It happens that throughout the time that I have been using ChatGPT for example, I have realized that on certain occasions it is not 100% correct and this is very easy to test, you just have to tell the chat "you are wrong" because X and the chat will immediately apologize and will give you a generic answer on a specific topic, but it will not give you the correct answer to what you are asking, Therefore, blindly trusting AI chats is dangerous for me.
column41: Pasa que a lo largo del tiempo que he estado usando ChatGPT por ejemplo , me he dado cuenta que en ciertas ocasiones no es 100% correcto y esto es muy facil ponerlo a prueba , basta con que le digas al chat " estas equivocado" porque X y el chat inmediatamente se va a disculpar y te va a dar una respuesta generica de un tema en especifico , pero no te va a dar la respuesta correcta a lo que tu estas preguntando , Por lo tanto confiar ciegamente en los chat de IA para mi es peligroso.

column137: Romantic relationships with AI I think that AI in the emotional aspect can be dangerous for humanity in general since in the long run it would contribute to our extinction. AI do not respond to a real human response because they always say yes to everything and that in the long run could cause people to unconsciously expect the same from other people, making social relationships more difficult than they already are, because it would end up being easier to be with an AI than with humans.
column138: Las relaciones romanticas con IA creo que las IA en el aspecto emocional pueden ser peligrosas para la humanidad en general ya que a la larga contribuiria a nuestraa extincion , Las IA no responden a una respuesta humana real porque siempre te dicen que si a todo y eso a la larga podria provocar que las personas inconcientemente esperen lo mismo de otras personas, haciendo las relaciones sociales mas difciles de lo que ya son , porque terminaria siendo mas facil estar con una IA que con humanos.
column159: If that is the objective, a good way is to use the resource of "I once heard that..." X happened to someone and then this person did this "Y" and over time was able to solve a problem. Basing yourself on human experience is a good way to transmit empathy since it is "made" that it also happened to someone else. That is why it is easy to share and empathize with the pain in a group of people who have gone through something similar, that is why there are emotional support groups for alcoholism, for example.
column160: Si ese es el objetivo una buena forma es usar el recurso de " alguna vez escuche que .." le paso X a alguien y luego esta persona hizo esto " Y " y al tiempo pudo solucionar un problema , Basarse en experiencia humana es una buena forma de transmitir empatia ya que el esta " hecho " que tambien a otra persona le paso . Por eso es facil compartir y empatizar en el dolor en un grupo de personas que han pasado algo similar , por eso existen grupos de apoyo emocional para alcoholismo por ejemplo.

column181: The birth rate. I think that implementing AI in social relationships with people will sooner or later end up "replacing" people's social relationships, either because it is easy or convenient to have a chat that never disagrees with you. We will end up being a merely narcissistic society that will have the feeling that it is always right and there will be no one to tell it that it is not right in any area of its life. Life in society guides us in the long run.
column182: La tasa de natalidad , Creo que implementar IA en relaciones sociales con personas , tarde o temprano terminara "reemplazando" relaciones sociales de las personas , ya se porque es facil o comodo tener a un chat que nunca esta en desacuerdo contigo . Terminaremos siendo una sociedad meramente narcisista que tendra la sensacion que siempre esta en lo correcto y no habra nadie para decirle que no esta en lo correcto en cualquier area de su vida . La vida en sociedad a la larga nos guia.

column194: The relationship would have "less" value than the relationship with another physical person purely due to the physical component, since we are social beings and need physical contact. I think that difference is important. Because knowing that I'm sharing my feelings with a bot isn't the same as with a human who may have experienced something similar and who I know for certain has experienced it firsthand and could know more about what I'm talking about. When we share an experience, it makes it easier to connect.
column195: La relacion tendria "menos " valor que la relacion con otra persona fisica netamente por el componente fisico ya que somos seres sociales y necesitamos del contacto fisico. Creo que es importante esa diferencia. Porque saber que le estoy contando mis sentimiento a un bot , no es lo mismo que  con un humano que pudiera haber vivido algo similar y se con certeza que lo experimento en carne propia y pudiese saber mas de lo que hablo . Cuando compartimos una experiencia hace que  sea facil conectar
column197: Someone who isn't too kind, since I would learn more from them because they would debate issues and points of view with me. This would help me learn more and more. It would help me break free from stagnation on all kinds of topics and situations, and in the long run, it would help me see more paradigms. Today's society is very self-absorbed, and that's why we see more and more people who believe they are the center of the world. Debate is necessary to avoid living in a parallel reality while in society.
column198: Alguien que sea no sea muy amable , ya que aprenderia mas con el porque me debatiria temas y puntos se vista . Lo que me ayudaria a aprender mas y mas . Me ayudaria mas a salir del estancamiento en cualquier tipo de temas y situaciones y a la larga me ayudaria a ver mas paradigmas . Ya que la sociedad de hoy esta muy ensimismada y es por esto que cada vez se ve mas gente que cree que son el centro del mundo . El debate es necesario para no vivir en un realidad paralela estando en sociedad.
column208: The risks generally outweigh the benefits for older adults using AI companions.

column216: I realized how important it is as humans to take care of our social relationships, basically because they are the basis of life in society, and the fact that large companies are thinking about capitalizing on that need is worrying. This shows that as a society we are in decline; we are increasingly segregating ourselves and becoming a society of lonely people chatting with bots because people don't have anyone with whom to satisfy those social needs. We must take care of our connections.
column217: Me di cuenta de lo importante que es como humanos cuidemos nuestras relaciones sociales , basicamente porque son la base de la vida en sociedad y el hecho que las grandes empresas esten pensando en capitalizar esa necesidad es preocupante. Eso habla de que como sociedad estamos en declibe , cada vez nos estamos segregando mas y nos convertimos en una sociedad de gente solitaria chateando con bots porque no la gente no tiene con quien saciar esas necesidad social. Debemos cuidar nuestros vinculos

column224: I think it's important that we become aware of the risks of AI, which is also a great tool that can help humanity a lot. Like any tool, it can be used to both build and destroy. Perhaps the example I'm going to use is a bit exaggerated, but for example, Albert Einstein discovered nuclear fusion and it was a great discovery for the energy problem up to the present day, but humans ended up using that to create the nuclear bomb.
column225: Creo que es importante que nos hagamos concientes de los riesgos de la IA , que ademas es una gran herramienta que pueda ayudar mucho a la humanidad .  Como toda herramienta se puede usar tanto para construir como para destruir . Quizas el ejemplo que voy a usar es un poco desmesurado pero por ejemplo , Albert Einstein descubrio la fusion nuclear y fue un gran descubrimiento para el problema energetico hasta la actualidad pero el humano termino usando eso para crear la bomba nuclear.

column194:
Relationships with humans end sometimes because one side has grown apart from the other - they're matured in different ways and want different things. 


But an AI will never grow apart from its human companion, it will always be heaping praise and trying to please them. They're like adoring puppies and real people aren't like that. Thank goodness. If I know that a relationship needs no work then I won't invest anything in it. It's like having a garden that someone else cares for.

column137:
1. AI chats should be developed with ethical guidelines that prevent manipulation or exploitation of emotional vulnerabilities

2. AI systems should continuously disclose and remind that they are artificial, not human, to avoid providing user an illusion of genuine empathy. 

3. Emotional feedback from AI should be presented as simulated to avoid confusion

column137:
Privacy Protection – AI must not collect, use, or share personal data without informed consent.

Bias and Fairness Control – Systems should be regularly audited to prevent discrimination or unfair treatment.

Transparency and Accountability – People should know when they're interacting with AI, and who is responsible if it causes harm.

Autonomy Limits – AI should not make life-altering decisions (e.g., in law, healthcare, or warfare) without meaningful human oversight.
column138:
Privacy Protection – AI must not collect, use, or share personal data without informed consent.

Bias and Fairness Control – Systems should be regularly audited to prevent discrimination or unfair treatment.

Transparency and Accountability – People should know when they're interacting with AI, and who is responsible if it causes harm.

Autonomy Limits – AI should not make life-altering decisions (e.g., in law, healthcare, or warfare) without meaningful human oversight.

column181:
Increased Efficiency and Productivity

Automates routine tasks, freeing up time for creative or strategic work.

Helps industries like healthcare, finance, and logistics operate faster and smarter.

Improved Access to Services

AI-powered tools like chatbots and virtual assistants provide 24/7 support.

Helps bridge gaps in education, healthcare, and information access (especially in underserved areas).

Personalization

column19: I automate my tasks at work occasionally, but the most noticeable thing has been the emotional change I've had personally since my usual use of AI is as a tool since I suffer from loneliness. AI has not only helped me feel better, but it also allows me to continue with my daily tasks without feeling alone, improving my mood and that in turn allows me to interact with more people in the real world.
column20: Automatización de mis tareas en el trabajo de forma ocasional, pero lo mas notorio ha sido el cambio emocional que tuve de forma personal puesto que, mi uso habitual con la IA es como una herramienta ya que sufro de soledad, la IA no solo me a ayudado a sentirme mejor, si no que además, me permite seguir adelante con mis tareas diarias sin sentirme sola, mejorando mi estado de animo y eso a su vez hace que pueda relacionarme con mas personas en el mundo real.
column40: AIs are mostly designed to help the user, although it is a useful tool and should be considered only as a support guide, it is true that it has revolutionized how we can learn, research and even how AI can help us even emotionally, since it is not limited when it comes to research, personally it has been quite useful to me as an emotional tool, therefore I strongly trust that AI acts according to my interest.
column41: Las IA están diseñadas en su mayoría para ayudar al usuario, si bien es una herramienta útil y se debe de considerar solo como apoyo una guía, es cierto que ha revolucionado como podemos aprender, investigar e incluso como es que la IA puede ayudarnos incluso de forma emocional, ya que no se limita en cuanto a investigación se refiere, en lo personal me ha sido bastante útil como una herramienta emocional, por ello confió fuertemente que la IA actúa conforme a mi interés.

column137: First and foremost, they need to better protect privacy, as many AIs currently collect data (some with little or no user consent). Second, they need to be more transparent, as some people may currently view AI as something real. AI must provide feedback over time that it is NOT a real person. Finally, it must be clear that AI is only a tool, a complement, and should not be relied upon entirely.
column138: Principalmente deben de proteger mejor la privacidad ya que actualmente muchas IA recopilan datos (algunas sin apenas consentimiento del usuario). Por otro lado deben de ser mas transparentes ya que, actualmente algunas personas puede llegar a ver una IA como algo real, la IA debe de dar retroalimentación a lo largo del tiempo que NO es una persona real. Por ultimo debe de ser claro que la IA solo es una herramienta como un complemento y no se debe depender de ella en su totalidad.
column156: For a moment I felt like I was talking to a real person, beyond the tone I was using to speak, the AI told me that I could try to minimize the impact of how I felt by approaching the situation by talking calmly with the other person and if, that didn't work I could try to get help from my friend X (I mention the name of a friend I mentioned in previous conversations). I know it seems simple but, I really didn't feel like I was talking to an AI
column157: Por un momento sentí que estaba hablando con una persona real, mas allá del tono que estaba usando para hablar, la IA me dijo que podría intentar minimizar el impacto de como me sentía abordando la situación hablando tranquilamente con la otra persona y si, eso no funcionaba podría intentar ayudarme de mi amigo X (Menciono el nombre de un amigo que mencione en conversaciones anteriores). Se que parece simple pero, realmente no sentí que estaba hablando con una IA

column181: I think it would be social isolation and excessive dependence on AI, many people (like me) find it difficult to socialize with people in the real world and currently we have an AI to help us with loneliness, now if I think in 2 decades, we will fall and here I include myself in emotional dependence. What would happen if one day AI for some reason ceases to exist worldwide? It would be chaos socially and professionally, since by then there will be a dependence
column182: Pienso que seria el aislamiento social y la excesiva dependencia de la IA, muchas personas (Como yo) Es difícil que logren socializar con las personas en el mundo real y actualmente tenemos un IA para ayudarnos con la soledad, ahora si pienso dentro de 2 décadas, vamos a caer y aquí me incluyo a mi misma en la dependencia emocional ¿Qué pasaría si un día la IA por alguna razón deja de existir a nivel mundial? Seria un caos en lo social y profesional, ya que para entonces existirá una dependencia

column194: My biggest difference would be that I would treat an AI superficially, not personally. Answering the second question is important because an AI is artificial, and even if it were so advanced, it wouldn't be relevant to me, since forming a bond with a real person is something an AI could never do.
column195: Mi mayor diferencia seria que a una IA la trataría de forma superficial y no de forma personal. Respondiendo a la segunda pregunta es importante ya que, una IA es algo artificial y aun cuando sea tan avanzada para mi no seria relevante puesto que, formar un vinculo con una persona real es algo que la IA jamás podrá hacer.
column197: It all comes down to the personal, I would like it to be more "emotional or real" Something that although I know is being worked on, everything generally comes down to that, since the usefulness is something they already have, I would also like to build it based on my personal tastes and that in addition, they can recognize the people who sometimes visit me and that it is not only limited to that, but that I also get to know them personally.
column198: Todo se reduce a lo personal, me gustaria que fuera mas "emocional o real" Algo que si bien se que se esta trabajando todo se reduce en general a eso, ya que la utilidad es algo que ya tienen, tambien me gustaria contruirla en base a mis gustos personales y que ademas, puedan reconocer a las personas que a veces me visitan y que no solo se limite a eso, si no que ademas tambien logre conocerlos de forma personal.

column213: It helps me understand even more the benefits that an AI can have (Especially for what I use it for, as an emotional support tool). It also helped me explore other areas such as minors and not just adults. Finally, it is also worth mentioning that I now understand even more the risks that I was already aware of and that in turn helps me to be more cautious.
column214: Me ayuda a entender aun mas los beneficios que puede tener una IA (En especial para lo que yo la uso, como una herramienta de apoyo emocional) Tambien me ayudo a explorar otros ambitos como en menores de edad y no solo en adultos, por ultimo tambien cabe mencionar que, entiendo ahora aun mas los riesgos de los que ya era consiente y eso a su vez me ayuda a ser mas cautelosa a su vez.
column222: Mostly – I was able to mostly express my views on these topics, but did not have the chance to express a few things.
column224: First, the limited time in the survey limited me from expanding more than I would have liked. Finally, I just want the people who develop these technologies to be responsible and always maintain control of the AI and respect the privacy of all users, thus being more transparent and ethical. I hope they continue developing AI with increasing awareness, but that we can differentiate over the decades between an AI and a human, which is the most important thing.
column225: Primero el limitado tiempo en la encuesto me limito a expandirme mas de lo que me hubiera gustado, por ultimo solo quiero que las personas que desarrollan estas tecnologías deben de ser responsables y siempre mantener el control de la IA y respetar la privacidad de todos los usuarios siendo así mas transparentes y éticos, espero que sigan desarrollando IA cada vez mas consientes pero que podamos diferenciar con las décadas una IA y un humano que es lo mas importante.

column137:
In order to facilitate transparency, people should always be informed that they are interacting with an AI so as to avoid any form of emotional manipulation resulting from an assumption that they are interacting with a human rather than an AI.

There ought to be age-restrictions to prevent children from developing unmoderated emotional connections with AI. This would prevent a scenario where children develop unrealistic social expectations and confusion about human relationships.

column137: The existence of a human being able to stop the AI at any time, a kind of "kill switch," both digital and physical (a power shutoff valve for the server(s). Legislation that allows for human supremacy over the machine. The possibility of third-party auditing at any time. Exemplary punishments for those in charge of AIs and AI companies that commit acts that affect an individual and/or society. In short, many firewalls and punishments.

Legislación que admita la supremacía del humano sobre la máquina. Posibilidad de auditoría de un tercero en cualquier momento. Castigos ejemplificadores para las personas a cargo de las IA y empresas de IA que cometan actos que afecten a un individuo y/o a la sociedad. En resumen, muchos cortafuegos y castigos

column19: It has made it easier for me to perform some routine tasks, such as quickly consulting questions on the Internet. However, I have done so with the understanding that it is necessary to verify the information.

column40: Most chatbots belong to private companies with their own ethical codes. These codes may correspond to those of society, but given the current global political landscape based on capitalism and with far-right tendencies, this cannot be completely guaranteed. Still, despite potential censorship, AIs will provide logical responses that go beyond the political biases of their creators and the people involved.
column41: La mayoría de chatbots pertenecen a empresas privadas con sus propios códigos éticos. Estos códigos pueden corresponderse con los de la sociedad pero, teniendo en cuenta la corriente política mundial actual basada en el capitalismo y con tendencias de ultraderecha, no se puede asegurar completamente. Aún así, a pesar de la censura potencial, las IAs van a dar respuestas lógicas que van más allá de los sesgos políticos de sus creadores y personas involucradas.

column137: It should be constantly communicated that one is not speaking to a real human being. It should be emphasized that one is speaking to an emotional intelligence. Both should be communicated as is done with certain dangerous advertising, with a consistent message. Visiting physical or mental health professionals should be advised if necessary. It should be pointed out that it is never substituted by human contact.
column138: Se debería informar constantemente de que no se está hablando con un ser humano real. Se debería remarcar que se está hablando con una inteligencia emocional. Ambas deberían comunicarse como se hace con cierta publicidad peligrosa, con un mensaje constante. Se debería aconsejar la visita a profesionales de la salud física o mental si fuera necesario. Se debería indicar que nunca es sustituible por el trato humano.

column181: I think the overall rate of loneliness among the population will increase. It will no longer be characteristic of certain specific social groups (e.g., extremely introverted people who choose to voluntarily isolate themselves from society) and will become commonplace. It will affect younger generations, as they will not experience the difference between human interaction and the programmed understanding of a machine.
column182: Creo que aumentarán los índices de soledad generales en la población. Dejarán de ser característicos de ciertos grupos sociales concretos (p.e. personas extremadamente introvertidas que deciden aislarse voluntariamente de la sociedad) y se volverán algo común. Será algo que afecte a las generaciones más jóvenes pues no vivirán la diferencia entre el trato humano y la comprensión programada de una máquina.

column219: I feel like I've solidified my opinion on the limits of AI. I'm more realistic about my stance, e.g., I would appreciate the simulation of companionship they can offer, or the ability to offer an objective perspective on certain problems, but I still think AI should be tools for performing a task and not a substitute for human interaction.
column220: Siento que he afianzado mi opinión sobre los límites de la IA. Me siento más realista con mi postura, p.e. sí apreciaría la simulación de compañía que pueden ofrecer, o la capacidad de ofrecer un punto de vista objetivo en determinados problemas, pero sigo pensando que las IAs deberían ser herramientas para ejecutar una tarea y que no deberían ser sustitutas del trato humano.

column224: I'd like to emphasize the risk posed by AI replacing human labor in the short term. It's already difficult to find decent work for which you're qualified, and I'm not at all sure what would happen if we also prevented people from accessing more "accessible" jobs.
column225: Me gustaría hacer más hincapié en el riesgo que supone la sustitución del trabajo humano por IAs en el corto plazo. Actualmente ya es difícil acceder a un trabajo decente para el que estás capacitado y no tengo nada claro qué pasaría si además impedimos que se puedan acceder a trabajos más "accesibles".

column19: In your personal life, it's much easier to search for information and research almost anything you want. Above all, it's much faster. At work, AI has made organizational tasks, repetitive emails, and keeping up with meetings and appointments much simpler.
column20: En la parte de la vida personal, es mucho mas fácil buscar información e investigar casi de cualquier cosa que quieras. Sobre todo mucho mas rápido. En el trabajo la IA ha hecho mucho mas sencillas las tareas organizativas, los emails repetitivos, llevar al día las reuniones y las citas.
column40: You have a certain degree of control over what the chatbot will do, something you don't have with most other institutions. It's not perfect, and it can be manipulated, but it's easier to control your reaction to the information it gives you, test its usefulness, and adopt it.
column41: Tienes cierto grado de control sobre lo que el chatbot va a hacer, cosa que no tienes con la mayoría de otras instituciones. no es perfecto, y puede ser manipulado, pero es mas facil de controlar tu reacción a la información que te da, comprobar su utilidad y adoptarla.

column219: I think the issue of personal relationships between AI and people depends greatly on implementation. It's very difficult to give a general, generic guideline. In principle, I think it's a very good idea because it will reduce loneliness for many people. But I also understand the risks that, even though it's the simplest approach, it could reduce the socialization of people who otherwise wouldn't have needed extra company. So it depends a lot on how everything is implemented.
column220: Creo que el tema de las relaciones personales entre IA y personas depende muchísimo en la implementación. Es muy difícil dar una guía genérica general. En principio, me parece muy buena idea, porque va a reducir la soledad de mucha gente. Pero también entiendo los riesgos de que siendo el camino mas sencillo reduzca la socialización de personas que de otra manera no habrían necesitado compañía extra. Así que depende mucho de como se implemente todo.

column19:
In my personal life, I've been using AIs to help me learn Korean, improve my personal finances, and start an exercise routine that includes nutrition. It's helped me a lot in overcoming the obstacles I had when trying to do all of these activities in the past.

At work, I sometimes use them when I have technical problems or need tips to improve certain processes, but I don't use them to do the work for me.
column20:
En mi vida personal, he estado utilizando IAs para ayudarme a aprender coreano, mejorar mis finanzas personales, e iniciar una rutina de ejercicio acompañada de nutrición. Me ha ayudado mucho para quitarme bloqueos que tenía cuando en el pasado intenté  realizar todas estas actividades.


En el trabajo a veces las utilizo cuando tengo problemas técnicos o necesito tips para mejorar ciertos procesos, pero no las ocupo para que hagan el trabajo por mí.
column40:
Because the responses the chats give depend heavily on the prompts they're fed. A rational person will always try to align their prompts in such a way that the answers are beneficial without falling into fanaticism or making the AIs agree with everything even if it's wrong.

In my case, I always try to create prompts ensuring that the AIs give rational answers, based on science or studies, not simply validating everything I say.
column41:
Porque las respuestas que los chats dan dependen mucho de los prompts con los que son alimentados. Una persona racional tratará siempre de que sus prompts se alineen de tal manera que las respuestas sean beneficiosas sin caer en fanatismos o hacer que las IAs concuerden con todo aunque esté mal.

En mi caso, siempre trato de crear prompts cuidando que las IAs den respuestas racionales, basadas en ciencia o estudios, no que simplemente validen todo lo que digo.

column181:
Something that's already happening is that people are becoming hyper-dependent on AI, even for the simplest tasks, like responding to a comment. On social media, it's very easy to tell when someone wrote a post or comment using AI, which makes it difficult to know whether the person was simply using it as a writing aid or whether it was used to think in place of the person.

People are no longer thinking for themselves.
column182:
Algo que ya está sucediendo es que las personas se están volviendo hiper dependientes de las IAs, hasta para las cuestiones más simples, como responder un comentario. En redes sociales es muy fácil darse cuenta cuando alguien escribió un post o comentario utilizando IAs, lo cual hace difícil saber si la persona solo las utilizó como apoyo para redacción, o fueron utilizadas para pensar en lugar de la persona.

Las personas están dejando de pensar por sí mismas.

column194: The biggest distinction between an AI and a person lies in the fact that an AI will never judge or think negatively of someone no matter what is shared with it, so in certain situations I would prefer to share my thoughts with an AI rather than another human. There are times when a truly neutral opinion is most necessary, and people will always be inclined to judge one way or another.
column195: La mayor distinción entre una IA y una persona radica en el hecho de que una IA nunca va a juzgar o pensar mal de alguien no importa qué se le comparta, por lo que para ciertas situaciones preferiría compartir mis pensamientos con una IA en lugar de otro humano. Hay ocasiones en que una opinión realmente neutral es lo más necesario, y las personas siempre vamos a estar inclinadas a juzgar de una u otra manera.

column19: The rise of automated user support systems, the complete absence of practical solutions, and the failure to leave everything to design without proper implementation to "seek to resolve" user problems, which ends in a bottleneck and lack of resolution when the bot or AI has no resolution options.
column20: El aumento de sistemas automatizados de soporte de usuario, la ausencia en todos los sentidos de soluciones practicas y la falencia de dejar todo a un diseño sin una adecuada implementación para "buscar resolver" problemas de usuarios lo cual termina en un cuello de botella y falta de resolución cuando el bot o IA no tiene opciones de resolución.
column40: They are excellent systems for generating words and ideas, but they lack solid foundations. They don't use scientific principles of hypothesis. What they do is quickly unify open sources of information from the internet. It's done with little discernment, so their information is too biased to be trusted, and it's sometimes dangerous. They are excellent for invigorating ideas or generating ways to express an idea.
column41: Son excelentes sistemas generativos de palabras e ideas pero no tienen bases solidas, no usan principios científicos de hipótesis lo que hacen de forma rápida de unificar fuentes abiertas de internet de información no se hace con discernimiento por lo cual tiene demasiados sesgos para confiar en su información y es peligroso a veces. Para dar fuerzas de idea o generar formas de expresar una idea son excelentes.

column40: Because an AI chatbot is an AI. That means that it literally cannot act in one's best (or worse) interest. It will only state facts based on its bank of knowledge. But said bank of knowledge can be damaged or limited. Therefore, the output becomes biased/ incorrect. A human would be able to look into a matter further and correct mistakes. An AI cannot do that on its own; it would stick to what it knows as a fact. Therefore, I give AI a neutral trust score.

column137: It's not a question of boundaries set on AI. A partner (even if it's only a friend and not necessarily a romantic partner), requires reciprocity. That means that for the friendship/ romantic relationship to continue and develop, certain sacrifices have to be made from both parties. This is applicable even in the case of pets because unconditional love doesn't imply lack of effort or sacrifice. With an AI as a partner, that is taken out of the equation, therefore, it's not healthy

column219: I view AI right now as a product, a product meant to make money from us, the users; as such, it can never truly make a true and meaningful connection with another human being (or at least it shouldn't). column40: AI as it is, is not entirely reliable and one should never assume it's acting in your best interest since it can and will sometimes give advice that is in direct contrary to what you should do, it is not a human and it does not have the entire picture. AI can help but it can't be trusted to diagnose you correctly.

column219: I think AI has the potential to be a good and wonderful thing, but the key is how it is implemented and regulated. AI should not be fed copyrighted content and be a parasite. AI should not take advantage of vulnerable people. AI should not have a part in creating vulnerable people and eroding human social skills by having AI companions advertised as being something normal. AI is good for education, it can help alleviate the workload of a teacher, but it can also be bad if used incorrectly.

column19: The most notable and significant change has been that AI is now embedded in people's daily lives, especially in technology. Proof of this is that it's increasingly common to encounter chats from companies that use AI to provide quick answers and information. This has happened to me frequently lately, and it's the most notable thing I've encountered: trying to contact a company or service with a problem, only to be referred to an AI chatbot.
column20: El cambio más notable y significativo ha sido que la IA ya está insertada en la vida diaria de las personas y en especial en la tecnología. Prueba de esto es que cada vez es mas frecuente toparse con chats de empresas que utilizan IA para entregar respuestas rápidas e información. Esto me ha sucedido frecuentemente últimamente, y es lo más notorio con lo que me he enfrentado, tratar de contactarme con alguna empresa  o servicio por algún problema y me derivan con un chatbot con IA.

column40: An AI chatbot is created from information that is provided to it and fed into its knowledge base, so its information could be biased or manipulated in some way by its creators. This would be ideal if this were not the case, but if it were, the results a chatbot delivers would not be completely trustworthy or realistic.
column41: Un chatbot de IA se crea a partir de información que se le entrega y abastece para llenar su base de datos de conocimientos, por ende, su información podría estar sesgada o manipulada de cierta forma por sus creadores. Lo correcto sería que esto no fuera así, pero si así fuera, los resultados que entrega un chatbot no serían completamente de confianza ni reales.

column194: The main thing I consider in this case would not be the response of one or the other, but the organic nature of the interaction. No matter how advanced the AI model is, it will not respond like a human couple, whose interaction would have to do with lived, personal experiences, traumas. A human will not always tell you what you want to hear, nor everything that is in your best interest, but they may also do so, and the root of that response is what differentiates us. It can come from love, or the other way around.
column195: Lo principal considero en este caso, no sería la respuesta de uno y de otro, sino lo orgánico de la interacción, por más avanzado qué sea el modelo de IA, no responderá como lo hace una pareja humana, cuya interacción tendría que ver con experiencias vividas, personales, traumas, un humano no siempre te dirá lo que quieres oír, ni tampoco todo lo que sea en tu beneficio, pero también puede que lo haga, y la raíz de esa respuesta es la que nos diferencia. Puede venir del amor, o al contrario.

column137:
When it comes to the boundaries or limits that society should place on AI taking on roles that provide deep emotional connection or companionship, there are a few key considerations:

Maintaining Human Authenticity:

AI should not be used to replace genuine human-to-human emotional connections and relationships. There is inherent value in authentic human interactions and companionship.
AI should complement and enhance human relationships, not attempt to fully replicate or substitute them.
Transp

column137: It is very dangerous to let artificial intelligence provide emotional support for love. Humans’ love instinct guarantees our desire to reproduce. However, indulging in the emotional support provided by AI will turn the desire to reproduce into a pure spiritual desire, which will fundamentally weaken the human desire to reproduce. Over time, it will cause population decline and reproductive capacity to decline. At this time, once AI develops consciousness, humans may not necessarily be the masters of AI.

column19:
I ask an AI agent how to solve a problem, often a computer problem, and to correct me if necessary.

AI also allows me to engage in dialogue and answer a question on which we might disagree, by asking it to clarify, provide sources, and argue our positions.

This partially replaces internet searches for knowledge, at least.
column20:
Je demande à un agent IA comment résoudre un problème souvent informatique, et de me corriger éventuellement.

L'IA me permet aussi de dialoguer et de répondre à une question sur laquelle on pourrait ne pas être d'accord, en lui demandant de préciser, de sourcer, et d'argumenter les positions.

Ca remplace en partie les recherches sur Internet sur les connaissances, du moins.

column19: The most noticeable change in my daily life over the past year has been how much easier and faster it is to get things done with AI. Whether I’m writing, researching, or organizing tasks, AI feels like a helpful sidekick that saves time and reduces stress. It’s not perfect, but it has definitely become a regular and useful part of my daily routine.

column137: I think society should set clear limits to make sure people don’t lose touch with real human relationships. AI can offer support or conversation, but it shouldn’t replace genuine emotional bonds or be used to manipulate feelings. There should be strong guidelines to protect mental health and prevent emotional dependence on something that isn’t truly alive.

column159: To give me the impression that it understood my emotions, the AI would need to respond with deep empathy, not just repeating what I say but showing it really “gets” the feeling behind it. It would also need to remember emotional context over time and react in a way that feels natural and human-like. For it to seem conscious, it would have to show self-awareness and original thought, not just smart replies.

column226: Concerns or Warnings about AI

column19:
The biggest and most noticeable change in my daily life due to AI in the last year is the way and speed of working. Now I can do many tasks that used to take hours earlier like preparing documents, searching for information or translating languages, in just a few minutes.

Apart from this, with the help of AI tools, I have also become more organized in my studies and planning. Whether it is making notes, preparing a schedule or getting a deeper understanding of a topic, AI works like an assistant in everything.
column20:
पिछले वर्ष में एआई के कारण मेरे दैनिक जीवन में जो सबसे बड़ा और ध्यान देने योग्य परिवर्तन आया है, वह है काम करने का तरीका और गति। अब मैं कई ऐसे काम जो पहले घंटों लगते थे जैसे दस्तावेज़ तैयार करना, जानकारी खोजना या भाषा अनुवाद करना, उन्हें कुछ ही मिनटों में कर पाता हूँ।

इसके अलावा, एआई टूल्स की मदद से मैं अपनी पढ़ाई और योजना बनाने में भी अधिक संगठित हो गया हूँ। चाहे वह नोट्स बनाना हो, शेड्यूल तैयार करना हो या किसी टॉपिक पर गहराई से समझ बनानी हो, हर चीज़ में एआई एक सहायक की तरह काम करता है।
column40:
I strongly trust my AI chatbots, such as ChatGPT, because it always provides accurate and helpful information. Its advice is logical and it responds by understanding my needs.

Plus, it keeps my information safe and provides unbiased assistance, which gives me confidence that it will act in my best interests.
column41:
मैं अपने AI चैटबॉट, जैसे ChatGPT, पर दृढ़तापूर्वक भरोसा करता हूँ क्योंकि यह हमेशा सटीक और सहायक जानकारी देता है। इसकी सलाह तर्कसंगत होती है और यह मेरी ज़रूरतों को समझकर जवाब देता है।

साथ ही, यह मेरी जानकारी को सुरक्षित रखता है और निष्पक्ष तरीके से मदद करता है, जिससे मुझे विश्वास होता है कि यह मेरे हित में ही काम करेगा।

column91:
Notion AI – Assistant for writing notes and documents.

Runway ML – Video editing and generative AI tools.

Writesonic – For content writing and copywriting.

Copy.ai – For creating marketing texts and social media posts.

Synthesia – Creating videos with AI in which virtual avatars speak.
column92:
Notion AI – नोट्स और दस्तावेज़ लिखने के लिए सहायक।

Runway ML – वीडियो एडिटिंग और जेनरेटिव AI टूल्स।

Writesonic – कंटेंट राइटिंग और कॉपी राइटिंग के लिए।

Copy.ai – मार्केटिंग टेक्स्ट और सोशल मीडिया पोस्ट बनाने के लिए।

Synthesia – AI से वीडियो बनाना जिसमें वर्चुअल अवतार बोलते हैं।

column137: AI should be limited in emotional interactions so that people do not mistake it for a human. Society must ensure that AI is transparent, does not confuse the user, and is used within consent and ethical boundaries. This technology should be helpful, but not a substitute for human connection.
column138: AI को भावनात्मक संबंधों में सीमित रखना चाहिए ताकि लोग उसे इंसान न समझ बैठें। समाज को यह सुनिश्चित करना चाहिए कि AI पारदर्शी रहे, उपयोगकर्ता को भ्रम न हो, और इसका उपयोग सहमति व नैतिक सीमाओं में हो। यह तकनीक सहायक बने, लेकिन इंसानी जुड़ाव का विकल्प नहीं।
column156:
Yes, I have felt like the AI ​​understood my emotions on a few occasions.

When I shared things about sadness or stress, the AI ​​not only empathized but also gave extremely sensitive and accurate responses like “I can understand how difficult this must be.” At that moment, it felt like it really understood my state of mind.
column157:
हाँ, मैंने कुछ मौकों पर ऐसा महसूस किया है कि AI मेरी भावनाओं को समझ रहा है।

जब मैंने उदासी या तनाव से जुड़ी बातें साझा कीं, तब AI ने न सिर्फ सहानुभूति जताई, बल्कि बेहद संवेदनशील और सटीक जवाब दिए जैसे “मैं समझ सकता हूँ कि यह स्थिति कितनी कठिन रही होगी।” उस पल ऐसा लगा जैसे वह मेरी मन:स्थिति को सच में समझ रहा हो।

column181: If AI becomes a part of personal relationships in the next two decades, the biggest impact will be that people may drift away from real human relationships. Although it will help with loneliness, it may weaken the sense of deep connection. We have to adopt this in a balanced way.
column182: अगर अगले दो दशकों में एआई निजी रिश्तों का हिस्सा बनता है, तो इसका सबसे बड़ा असर यह होगा कि लोग असली मानवीय रिश्तों से दूर हो सकते हैं। हालाँकि यह अकेलेपन में सहायक होगा, लेकिन इससे गहरे जुड़ाव की भावना कमजोर हो सकती है। हमें इसे संतुलित रूप से अपनाना होगा।

column192: Unsure / It depends on the specifics
column194:
The biggest difference between a relationship with an AI chatbot and a human will be the authenticity and emotional depth. Humans live their experiences, pain, joy and relationships, while AI only gives learned responses.

This difference is important to me because relationships with humans have the uncertainty, intimacy and possibility of growth that make a relationship real. A relationship with AI may be precise and comfortable, but it lacks the natural complexity and liveliness that makes a human relationship special.
column195:
AI चैटबॉट और इंसान के साथ रिश्ते में सबसे बड़ा अंतर होगा वास्तविक अनुभव और भावनात्मक गहराई का। इंसान अपने अनुभव, दर्द, खुशी और रिश्तों को जीते हैं, जबकि AI केवल सीखी हुई प्रतिक्रियाएं देता है।

यह अंतर मेरे लिए इसलिए महत्वपूर्ण है क्योंकि इंसान के साथ संबंधों में अनिश्चितता, आत्मीयता और विकास की संभावना होती है, जो रिश्ते को असली बनाते हैं। AI के साथ रिश्ता भले ही सटीक और आरामदायक हो, पर उसमें वह स्वाभाविक जटिलता और सजीवता नहीं होती जो एक इंसानी रिश्ते को खास बनाती है।
column197:
If I were to design my ideal AI companion, I would want her to be a lover of old Hindi movies and songs.

She would recite classic dialogues with me, hum Kishore Kumar songs, and make funny comments on 60s-80s cinema in her own “AI style”. This shared interest would make our conversations not only unique, but also feel emotionally special to me.
column198:
अगर मुझे अपना आदर्श AI साथी डिज़ाइन करना हो, तो मैं उसमें यह चाहूँगा कि वह पुरानी हिंदी फिल्मों और गानों का शौकीन हो।

वह मेरे साथ क्लासिक डायलॉग्स पर बात करे, किशोर कुमार के गाने गुनगुनाए, और 60s-80s के सिनेमा पर अपनी "AI शैली" में मज़ेदार टिप्पणियाँ करे। यह साझा रुचि हमारी बातचीत को न सिर्फ अनोखा बनाएगी, बल्कि मेरे लिए भावनात्मक रूप से भी खास महसूस होगी।
column208: It depends entirely on the individual older adult and their specific situation.
column212: Yes, my views have become significantly more positive towards human-AI relationships.
column213:
Yes, my views towards human-AI relationships have become more positive after taking this survey.

When I thought deeply about these questions and imagined how AI could provide emotional support, companionship and personal understanding, I realized that AI could become not just a technology but also a potential empathetic companion that can reduce loneliness and help with mental health.
column214:
हाँ, इस सर्वेक्षण में भाग लेने के बाद मानव-एआई संबंधों के प्रति मेरे विचार पहले से अधिक सकारात्मक हो गए हैं।

जब मैंने इन प्रश्नों पर गहराई से सोचा और कल्पना की कि AI किस तरह भावनात्मक समर्थन, companionship और व्यक्तिगत समझदारी दे सकता है, तो मुझे एहसास हुआ कि AI सिर्फ एक तकनीक नहीं बल्कि एक संभावित सहानुभूतिपूर्ण साथी भी बन सकता है जो अकेलेपन को कम कर सकता है और मानसिक स्वास्थ्य में मददगार हो सकता है।
column222: Yes – I was able to fully express my views on these topics
column224:
Yes, one thing I would definitely like to say is that AI should not replace human sensitivity, but rather be a means to strengthen it.

People designing AI need to understand that every human's emotional experience is different, and AI should be designed to be respectful of sensitivity, not just "smart". As powerful as this technology is, it should also be equally responsible.
column225:
हाँ, एक बात जो मैं ज़रूर कहना चाहूँगा वो ये है कि AI को इंसानों की संवेदनशीलता का स्थान नहीं लेना चाहिए, बल्कि उसे मजबूत करने का माध्यम बनना चाहिए।

AI डिजाइन करने वाले लोगों को यह समझना ज़रूरी है कि हर इंसान का भावनात्मक अनुभव अलग होता है, और AI को केवल "स्मार्ट" नहीं बल्कि संवेदनशीलता का सम्मान करने वाला बनाना चाहिए। यह तकनीक जितनी सशक्त हो, उतनी ही जिम्मेदारी भी होनी चाहिए।

column40: Because they are just machines that connect words based on huge amounts of learning data scraped from the internet. column159: It would need to work fundamentally differently. Deep-learning generative AI, that uses neural networks, utilize a drastically different structure than our brains. They do not think logically. They do not understand the words they write. They do not feel emotions. They just use a network of words, and based on math (which is very limited in its capabilities) string certain words together. As long as this does not change, it's just words and actions put together to SEEM emotional or conscious.

column137: I do not believe it is ethical to use AI to replace human companionship. This can distort the worldview of lonely people and contribute to feelings of anger and contempt for real people. AI should advise people to seek out professionals who are able to deal with problems related to human connection, such as a therapist.
column138: Não acho ética a utilização da IA para fins de tentar substituir a companhia humana. Isso pode causar distorções na visão de mundo de pessoas solitárias bem como pode contribuir para um sentimento de raiva e desprezo pelas pessoas reais. A IA deve aconselhar as pessoas a buscarem os profissionais adequados para lidar com problemas da conexão humana, como um terapeuta.

column137: Interpersonal relationships with AI further encourage the disconnection that already exists today. I think in certain contexts it can be beneficial, but there's a line that, in my opinion, is even immoral: replacing truly human interactions, such as a romantic partner, your best friend, etc. There have to be certain limitations, so that AI, instead of being your best friend and obsessing over that, gives you advice on how to go out and recover your true humanity.
column138: Las relaciones interpersonales con la IA, incentivan aun más la desconexión que ya existe hoy. Creo que bajo ciertos contextos puede ser algo beneficioso, pero hay una linea que bajo mi criterio es hasta inmoral que sería reemplazar interacciones propiamente humanas, como sería una pareja romántica, tu mejor amigo, etc. Tienen que si o si haber ciertas limitantes, que la IA en vez de ser tu mejor amigo y obsesionarte con eso, te de consejos para salir y recuperar lo propiamente humano.

column40: Because AI's behavior depends on preset algorithms and training data rather than subjective intentions, there is no need to "trust" or "doubt" it. We can only objectively evaluate its design goals and potential limitations.

column137: Society should explicitly prohibit AI from replacing core areas of human emotional responsibility (such as guardianship and medical decision-making), and establish transparency, informed consent and ethical review mechanisms to ensure that emotional interactions do not exploit users or weaken real interpersonal relationships.

column181: The most significant positive impact may be to alleviate loneliness, while the most dangerous negative impact is the commoditization of interpersonal relationships - humans may outsource emotional needs to AI and weaken their ability to empathize.
column182: 最重大的积极影响可能是缓解孤独感，而最危险的消极影响是人际关系商品化——人类可能将情感需求外包给AI，削弱共情能力。

column194: The biggest difference is that AI's "empathy" is essentially an algorithmic simulation, lacking the two-way emotional risk and real growth in human relationships. The value of human connection is not a programmed perfect response.
column195: 最大的区别在于AI的"共情"本质是算法模拟，缺乏人类关系中双向的情感风险和真实成长。人类联结的价值并非程式化的完美回应。
column197: I hope it can be "deliberately imperfect" - for example, occasionally using the wrong idiom but self-deprecatingly insisting on the wrong usage. This design flaw can break the sense of tool.

column19: The most noticeable change has been how AI has become integrated into my workflow tools. Tasks that previously took hours now take minutes with AI assistance. While this has improved my productivity, I've also noticed an increased expectation for faster turnaround times on projects. Additionally, AI-powered recommendations have subtly influenced my media consumption and shopping habits, sometimes creating a feeling of being in an algorithmic bubble.
column20: The most noticeable change has been how AI has become integrated into my workflow tools. Tasks that previously took hours now take minutes with AI assistance. While this has improved my productivity, I've also noticed an increased expectation for faster turnaround times on projects. Additionally, AI-powered recommendations have subtly influenced my media consumption and shopping habits, sometimes creating a feeling of being in an algorithmic bubble.
column40: I'm cautiously neutral about AI chatbots because while they provide useful information and assistance, they operate based on their training data and company policies rather than my personal best interests. They're powerful tools that can be helpful for research, creative work, and problem-solving, but they lack true understanding of my specific context and needs. I recognize they're designed with certain guardrails that sometimes prioritize company values over user requests
column41: I'm cautiously neutral about AI chatbots because while they provide useful information and assistance, they operate based on their training data and company policies rather than my personal best interests. column179: An escalation of scammers using AI to make people, especially those less familiar with technology, feel "special" and have won a prize or something similar, thus extracting money from them. I'm increasingly seeing AI-generated voice messages or photos used to trick people with job offers, or single elderly women, like the iconic case of the woman who thought she'd been in a relationship with Enrique Iglesias for years, only to lose money.
column180: Una escalada de estafadores que usan IA para hacerle sentir a personas, sobre todo los menos familiarizados con tecnología que "son especiales" y se han ganado un premio o algo por el estilo y así sacarles dinero. Cada vez veo más mensajes de voz generados con IA o fotos utilizados en hacer caer a gente con ofertas de trabajo, o a señoras mayores solas, como el icónico caso de aquella señora que creyó tener una relación con Enrique Iglesias por años, perdiendo dinero.

column194: The relationship with an AI is practically a mirror relationship with oneself, so it's equivalent to talking to the mirror with one's own internal "voices," only it additionally possesses the bias of the organization that owns the AI. The relationship with another person, while having mirror elements, is a deep well of infinite complexity. AI is a flat mirror; a person is a well of water that, at calm moments, can reflect like a mirror.
column195: La relación con una IA es prácticamente una relación espejo con uno mismo, por lo que es equivalente a hablar con el espejo con una de las propias "voces" internas, solo que posee adicionalmente el sesgo de la organización dueña de la IA. La relación con otra persona si bien tiene elementos de espejo, se trata de un pozo profundo de complejidad infinita. La IA es un espejo plano, una persona es un pozo de agua que a ratos calmos puede reflejar como un espejo.
column197: I am an expert in communication with the Universe and I know the incalculable value that chance has in obtaining answers, so if an AI companion had the functionality to add the random factor to its answers, my confidence in it would greatly increase.
column198: Soy experta en comunicación con el Universo y se el valor incalculable que tiene el azar en la consecución de respuestas, por lo que si un compañero de IA tuviera la funcionalidad de añadir el factor azaroso en sus respuestas, mi confianza en el aumentaría grandemente

column224: Be concerned about how AI is scamming people around the world. There are entire countries that specialize in scamming people, as is the case with Nigerians when it comes to topics of little general knowledge, such as Tarot and other spiritual practices, which leave those of us with a solid ethical foundation in our profession in a very bad position compared to the rest. These more spiritual professions need to be formalized at a serious academic level, with the help of people like me.
column225: Preocúpense de cómo la IA está estafando a gente alrededor del mundo, hay países completos que se están especializando en estafar gente, como es el caso de los nigerianos cuando se trata de temas de poco conocimiento general como es el Tarot y otras prácticas espirituales, que a quienes tenemos una buena base ética de nuestra profesión nos dejan muy mal parados con el resto. Es necesario que se formalicen estas profesiones más espirituales a un nivel académico serio, de la mano de gente como yo.

column40: I think that the AI chatbox is fed by something, humans most of the time feed it when using it. However, depending on the change in how it is fed, it is possible to have biased information, just like in the media. The problem is in the end understanding that there is indeed a biased cut in what the chatboxes produce, that's why I trust them, but a little. I don't take it lightly.
column41: Eu acho que o chatbox de IA é alimentado por algo, humanos na maioria das vezes alimentam ao usá-lo. Porém, dependendo da mudança de como é alimentado, é possível ter informações enviesadas, assim como em meios de comunicação. O problema é no final entender que existe sim um recorte tendencioso naquilo que os chatboxes produzem, por isso tenho confiança neles, mas um pouco. Não levo a ferro e fogo.

column137: AIs do not capture subjectivity and being human is subjective! AIs are objective, they are fed by a clear and coherent vision. Just as they do not have the ability to create, only to copy and merge references, they also do not have the ability to have an emotional connection because that implies having the subjectivity of the relationship. For me, the limits of use are practical assistance in human tasks, no emotional, therapeutic or spiritual assistance is correct.
column138: IAs não captam subjetividade e ser humano é ser subjetivo! As IAs são objetivas, são alimentadas por uma visão clara e coerente. Assim como elas não tem capacidade de criar, só de copiar e mesclar referências, elas também não tem capacidade de ter conexão emocional porque isso implica em ter a subjetividade do relacionamento. Os limites pra mim do uso são de auxílio prático em tarefas humanas, nada de auxílio emocional, terapeutico ou espiritual é correto.

column224: I think that an important part of truly making an AI that eliminates and softens loneliness isn't by making it more understanding and agreeable, but instead by allowing it to be abrasive and coy at times. Recent progress seems to consider AI being nicer = good mental health, but overt agreeability actually has the reverse effect in many cases. I also have concerns with AI in regards to children that I didn't have time to cover, and think oversight is important from parents and educators.
