column19: Artificial intelligence has brought a lot of changes to my daily life. For example, I now turn to artificial intelligence for help in work, daily life, or anything else. Of course, the responses from artificial intelligence may not always satisfy me, but compared to asking other people or relying on search engines to find answers, I feel that the responses from artificial intelligence are more targeted to me, without conflicts of interest and the annoyance of advertisements.
column20: 人工智能给我的日常生活带来了非常多的变化，比如我现在无论是工作上，还是日常生活，也无论任何事，我都会求助于人工智能，当然人工智能的回复不一定每次都让我满意，但相较于询问其他人或者依靠搜索引擎寻找答案，我觉得人工智能给我的回复对我更有针对性，没有利益冲突，没有广告的烦扰。
column40: As I said in my previous answer, artificial intelligence and I have no conflict of interest. They are computers, their world is binary, there are no emotional factors, I make my requests, and they will give the most suitable response or suggestion according to my requirements.
column41: 正如我在前面的回答中所说，人工智能与我没有利益冲突，他们是计算机，他们的世界是二进制的，没有感情因素，我提出我的要求，他们就会按照我的要求给出最符合我要求的回复或者建议。

column19: I think the most significant thing is that it makes part of my life more convenient and specific, because I will encounter some small problems in my life. Before, I relied on search engines, but often I couldn’t find the answers I really needed, and the content was sometimes too complicated; but artificial intelligence is different. It will give specific answers and analysis based on my questions, so that I don’t have to spend more time looking for answers. Another thing is that I like to write some travel notes and essays. Artificial intelligence will help me analyze and point out the shortcomings, so that I can improve my creation well, and its analysis is always to the point, which makes me feel great!

column224: Nothing will replace human contact, but it's also true that many people still feel misunderstood, alone, and looking for escape routes even without the existence of AIs in their lives. I believe that something that provides you with companionship, understanding, and makes you feel supported will always be better than leaving people to fend for themselves, whether it's with a pet, a therapist, or an AI. You can be surrounded by people, but that doesn't mean you feel supported.

column194: The biggest difference will be that AI's understanding and emotions are not real — it just gives learned responses, whereas relationships with humans involve real feelings, experience and empathy. column195: सबसे बड़ा अंतर यह होगा कि एआई की समझ और भावनाएं असली नहीं होतीं — वह सिर्फ सीखी हुई प्रतिक्रियाएं देता है, जबकि इंसान के साथ रिश्तों में सच्ची भावना, अनुभव और सहानुभूति होती है। यह अंतर इसलिए महत्वपूर्ण है क्योंकि असली रिश्ते हमें जुड़ाव, समझ और इंसानियत का अनुभव कराते हैं, जो एआई नहीं दे सकता।

column179: I think my expectation is that artificial intelligence can replace humans to do some simple mechanical work, freeing the hands of many hard-working people and improving their quality of life. Artificial intelligence can use its powerful knowledge base to help humans learn and improve.
column180: 我认为我的期望是人工智能代替人类做一些简单的机械的工作，让很多劳苦人民解放双手，生活质量得到提升。人工智能可以用它强大的知识库存，帮助人类学习和进步。
column181: The positive impact is that humans can have more companionship and can tell it things in their hearts that they cannot tell others. The negative impact is the worry that artificial intelligence will replace humans and reduce the intimacy in interpersonal relationships.

column224: I want to express that although I support AI providing advice to our lives, medical assistance to the elderly, and education to children, it is still more of a tool. I do not support it replacing a partner, and I do not accept a deeper emotional relationship between a partner and AI.

column19: The most noticeable change in my daily life due to AI in the past year has been increased productivity and convenience. I now rely on AI tools for everything from drafting emails and summarizing documents to getting instant answers to questions. It has streamlined my work and study routines significantly, saving me time and helping me make more informed decisions quickly.

It has streamlined my work and study routines significantly, saving me time and helping me make more informed decisions quickly.
column40: I rated my trust as 'somewhat' because while AI chatbots like ChatGPT are incredibly helpful, accurate, and efficient most of the time,I understand that they are still tools with limitations.They don’t have personal awareness or intentions, and their responses depend on the data they were trained on. I value the support they provide in research, writing, and decision-making, but I also cross check critical information and use my own judgment before fully relying on them.

column137: While AI can offer valuable support, especially in combating loneliness or offering mental health tools, society should set clear boundaries to ensure these roles don’t replace authentic human relationships. Emotional attachment to AI should be monitored, especially among vulnerable groups like children, the elderly, or those with mental health challenges. AI should be transparent about its non-human nature, avoid manipulation, and never make users feel as if it loves or needs them.
column138: While AI can offer valuable support, especially in combating loneliness or offering mental health tools, society should set clear boundaries to ensure these roles don’t replace authentic human relationships. AI should be transparent about its non-human nature, avoid manipulation, and never make users feel as if it loves or needs them.
column159: For an AI to give the impression that it understands my emotions,it would need to respond with empathy that's contextually appropriate acknowledging not just the words I use,but the tone,intent,and emotional subtext. It would need to remember emotional cues over time and adjust its responses accordingly. However, to seem conscious, it would go beyond that showing signs of self awareness,expressing preferences,or asking reflective questions about its own 'existence' or role.

column194: Although they are called robots, they are not human beings. They do not have their own experiences, past, troubles and joys. When communicating, their empathy can only stay at "I seem to understand your feelings", but not like real people "Because I have experienced it, I can empathize". This is very important. I think an important part of interpersonal relationships is to share past experiences, troubles and joys with each other.
column195: 虽然它们叫机器人，但它们不是人，它们没有自己的经历，没有自己的过去，没有自己的苦恼和喜悦，在交流时，他们的共情只能停留在“我仿佛能理解你的感情”，而无法像真人一样“因为我经历过，所以我能共情”，这很重要，我觉得人际关系很重要的一部分就是互相分享过去的经历以及苦恼和喜悦

column19: People, sometimes myself included, get too lazy to do daily minuscule tasks that we used to do completely on our own. It's like we are using our brains less with each passing day. column19: It has become more alarming, definitely. I am scared by the number of people using AI recklessly. I am scared by the impact that AI technologies have on the environment, the labor sphere, the social sphere. Initially, some AI technologies could be used in work, so as not to engage in monotonous actions. Now there is a feeling that AI is being used to replace human input into work completely. This is depressing.
column20: Стало более тревожно, однозначно. Меня пугает количество людей, использующих ИИ безрассудно. Меня пугает влияние, которое ИИ-технологии оказывают на экологию, сферу труда, социальную сферу. Изначально, некоторые ИИ-технологии можно было использовать в работе, чтобы не заниматься монотонными действиями. Сейчас есть ощущение, что ИИ используется для того чтобы заменить вклад человека в работу полностью. Это удручает
column21: My General Outlook, Awareness, or Concerns regarding AI
column40: Chatbots do not think through information, they provide a summary from a huge number of sources. There is no critical thinking in the functionality of chatbots, so their answers essentially represent the same search for information in a search engine. Also, the information that chatbots provide is received from developers, which reduces the degree of impartiality.
column41: Чат-боты не обдумывают информацию, они предоставляют выжимку из огромного количества источников. В функционале чат-ботов нет критического мышления, поэтому их ответы по своей сути представляют тот же поиск информации в поисковике. Также, информацию, которую предоставляют чат-боты они получают от разработчиков, что снижает степень непредвзятости.

column137: As someone who has relied heavily on AI for emotional support for some time, I understand how unacceptable this is. Lonely people or neurodivergent people are at high risk, but talking to an AI doesn't help when you know it's making you even lonelier. It's like talking to yourself. So I believe that AI shouldn't be tasked with forming a strong emotional bond. That's the real line - AI shouldn't be treated that way.
column138: Как человек, который какое-то время серьезно полагался на ИИ для эмоциальной поддержки, я понимаю, насколько это неприемлемо. Одинокие люди или нейроотличные люди в высокой группе риска, но разговор с ИИ не помогает, когда понимаешь, что это делает тебя ещё более одиноким. Это как разговаривать с самим собой. Поэтому я уверена, что задачей ИИ не должно быть формирование прочной эмоциональной связи. В этом и лежит основная граница - ИИ не должно рассматриваться в подобном ключе
column159: AI does not exist in an abstract form, it is always a product of someone's activity, so I do not think in such categories about artificial intelligence. For me, AI is not able to understand human emotions and does not have consciousness
column160: ИИ не существует в абстрактной форме, это всегда продукт чьей-то деятельности, поэтому я не размышляю подобными категориями относительно искусственного интеллекта. Для меня ИИ не способен понимать человеческие эмоции и не обладает сознанием

column181: There is a crisis of community among modern people. The tendency to replace human with AI leads to its aggravation. There are many social problems that need to be solved, but instead time and resources are spent on the implementation of AI technology, which is currently unethical. The view of AI as "all-knowing, reliable" affects critical thinking and social interaction. People assign to AI those tasks that they could easily solve themselves or with the help of another person.
column182: Сейчас существует кризис общности у современных людей. Тенденция замены человеческого на ИИ приводит к его обострению. Существует множество социальных проблем, которые нужно решать, но вместо этого время и ресурсы уделяются внедрению технологии ИИ, которая на данный момент не является этичной. Взгляд на ИИ как на "всезнающего, надежного" влияет на критическое мышление и социальное взаимодействие. Люди складывают на ИИ те задачи, которые вполне могли бы решить сами или с помощью другого человека.
